semester6.shcherbak_hw2_GHT¶

General Hough Transform.

semester6.shcherbak_hw2_GHT.build_accumulator(r_table, query_image)¶

Builds the accumulator array for a given image using the R-table.

Given R-table for a reference image, creates accumulator for another image. Both images should be grayscale. Also, creates accumulator that is used for plotting. Its elements are sums along the dimension corresponding to angles in the main accumulator.

Parameters:

  • r_table (defaultdict) – R-table for the reference shape that we search for

  • query_image (ndarray) – Image that presumably contains reference shape

Return type:

tuple

Returns:

Tuple of the main accumulator (used for finding the most probable locations) and accumulator used for plotting.

semester6.shcherbak_hw2_GHT.build_r_table(reference_image)¶

Builds the R-table from the given image.

Given image, builds R-table, which is a defaultdict with angles as keys and vectors to origin of the image (center point by default) as values.

Parameters:

reference_image (ndarray) – Reference shape to be found on images

Return type:

defaultdict

semester6.shcherbak_hw2_GHT.edges_gradient(image)¶

Calculates edges and gradient orientations for the image.

Parameters:

image (ndarray) – Image, represented by 2D array

Return type:

tuple

semester6.shcherbak_hw2_GHT.general_hough(reference_image, query_image, path_for_saving)¶

Performs General Hough Transform.

For any reference image and any query image, performs transform, marks locations and directions of the reference image on the query image, and saves results.

Parameters:

  • reference_image (ndarray) – The image containing a shape that is to be found on another image.

  • query_image (ndarray) – The image that presumably contains that shape.

  • path_for_saving (str) – The path to the image that will contain results. By default, main method passes

Return type:

None

semester6.shcherbak_hw2_GHT.n_max_ind(array, n)¶

Returns indices of n maximum values in an N-dimensional array

Parameters:

  • array (ndarray) – Array

  • n (int) – Number of elements to returns. They are sorted in descending order.

Return type:

ndarray

Returns:

Indices of n max elements.

semester6.wikipedia¶

Retrieving random page from Wikipedia

class semester6.wikipedia.Page(title, extract)¶

Page resource.

title¶

The title of the Wikipedia page.

extract¶

A plain text summary.

semester6.wikipedia.random_page(language='en')¶

Return a random page.

Performs a GET request to the /page/random/summary endpoint.

Parameters:

language (str) – The Wikipedia language edition. By default, the English Wikipedia is used (“en”).

Return type:

Page

Returns:

A page resource.

Raises:

ClickException – The HTTP request failed or the HTTP response contained an invalid body.
